title: Englander looks at pressures on global currencies.
summary: In an interview on Bloomberg TV, Steven Englander, head of Group of 10 currency strategy at Citi, discusses the outlook for major currencies now that policy makers face more limited fiscal and monetary policy options than in 2009.
tag-1: Englander looks at pressures on global currencies.
tag-2: In an interview on Bloomberg TV, Steven Englander, head of Group of 10 currency strategy at Citi, discusses the outlook for major currencies now that policy makers face more limited fiscal and monetary policy options than in 2009.
